title: Going to the Doctor
subtle: Personal Narrative (nonfiction), 162 words, Level G (Grade 1), Lexile 480L
description: Many people go to the doctor for a checkup. Going to the Doctor lets students tag along on a young girl's visit to the doctor for her yearly checkup. The book can also be used to teach students how to determine an author's purpose for writing and the proper use of conjunctions.
meta: blood pressure, checkup, cuff, doctor, height, weight
Connect to prior knowledge to understand nonfiction text
Author's Purpose : Determine the author’s purpose for writing
Variant Vowel Sounds : Discriminate variant vowel /oo/ sound within words
Vowel Digraphs : Identify vowel digraph oo words
Conjunctions : Recognize and use the conjunction and
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word around
